info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.operate.usb
info.description: Proto definitions for runtime USB info on sites.

get.description: Get USB configuration from the node

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "value"
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

parameters.name: site
parameters.description:
Site Name

x-example: "value"
Name of the site

parameters.name: node
parameters.description:
Node Name

x-example: "master-0"
Name of the node

address.description:
Address of the device on the bus in decimal

Example: ` "4"`
address.title: address

b_device_class.description:
The class of this device

Example: ` "hub"`
b_device_class.title: b_device_class

b_device_protocol.description:
The protocol (within the sub-class) of this device

Example: ` "0002"`
b_device_protocol.title: b_device_protocol

b_device_sub_class.description:
The sub-class (within the class) of this device

Example: ` "hub"`
b_device_sub_class.title: b_device_sub_class

b_max_packet_size.description:
Maximum size of the control transfer

Example: ` "64"`
b_max_packet_size.title: b_max_packet_size

bus.description:
The bus on which the device was detected in decimal

Example: ` "1"`
bus.title: bus

description.description:
Device description

Example: ` "NetVista Full Width Keyboard (IBM Corp.)"`
description.title: description

i_product.description:
Product name reported by device

Example: ` "xHCI Host Controller"`
i_product.title: i_product

i_serial.description:
Index of Serial Number String Descriptor

Example: ` "0000:00:14.0"`
i_serial.title: i_serial_number

id_product.description:
Product ID (Assigned by Manufacturer) in hex

Example: ` "0x0002"`
id_product.title: id_product

id_vendor.description:
Vendor ID (Assigned by USB Org) in hex

Example: ` "0x1d6b"`
id_vendor.title: id_vendor

port.description:
Port on which the device was detected in decimal

Example: ` "3"`
port.title: port

product_name.description:
Product ID translated to name (if available)

Example: ` "NetVista Full Width Keyboard"`
product_name.title: product_name

speed.description:
The negotiated operating speed for the device

Example: ` "high"`
speed.title: speed

vendor_name.description:
Vendor ID translated to name (if available)

Example: ` "IBM Corp."`
vendor_name.title: vendor_name

siteUsbType.description:
Type of USB device

Unknown USB device type
Internal USB present in Certified HW
USB device present during node registration
USB device that can be matched by USB rules
siteUsbType.title: UsbType

usbUsbAddRulesRequest.description: Request to add USB Enablement Rules
usbUsbAddRulesRequest.title: USB Add Rules Request

namespace.description:
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

Example: ` "value"`
namespace.title: Namespace

usbUsbAddRulesResponse.description: Response to add USB Enablement Rules
usbUsbAddRulesResponse.title: USB Add Rules Responsse

usb_allow_list_enable.description:
Enablement of USB rules list. If enabled, all new connected USB devices must be authorized.

Example: ` false`
usb_allow_list_enable.title: usb_allow_list_enable

usbUsbDeleteRulesRequest.description: Request to delete USB Enablement Rules
usbUsbDeleteRulesRequest.title: USB Delete Rules Request

namespace.description:
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

Example: ` "value"`
namespace.title: Namespace

usbUsbDeleteRulesResponse.description: Response to delete USB Enablement Rules
usbUsbDeleteRulesResponse.title: USB Delete Rules Responsse

usbUsbListResponse.description: Response to list available USB devices
usbUsbListResponse.title: USB List Responsse

namespace.description:
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

Example: ` "value"`
namespace.title: Namespace

usb.description: List of USB devices in server
usb.title: USBDevice

usbUsbListRulesResponse.description: Response to list USB Enablement Rules
usbUsbListRulesResponse.title: USB List Rules Responsse

namespace.description:
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

Example: ` "value"`
namespace.title: Namespace
